name: Void: GMTK game jam 2019
description:
Note: To have the full experience of this game, we recommend you to play the downloadable version (soundtrack isn't working on the browser)

Void is a submission for the GMTK game jam 2019.

Theme: Only one.

How does the theme is integrated into the game?

  • Only one life
  • Only one second to memorize the path
  • Only one battery pack can be carried
  • Only one mistake is allowed thanks to your intuition
  • Only one character lost in the void

What is is about?

Void is about a young boy's feeling of loneliness. Trying to find a way out of isolation.

  • Are you really alone when you are isolated? 
  • Are those strange feelings, vision and sounds real or part of you imagination?
  • How do you know what is real when nobody can experience it with you?
  • Will you escape or disappear into the void?
  • Will you be brave enough to taste pure void in "Extreme" mode?

There is ONLY ONE way to know. Play our game!

If you like it, don't forget to vote for us here!
https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2019/rate/461449
